content: **crocheted bag / shopping net in drops safran the piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-342 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference = 50 cm height = 36 cm **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a colors shown 100 g colour 63 sea green 100 g colour 59 red clay 100 g colour 68 coffee one bag weighs approx 70-75 gram **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm crochet gauge 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
